articles.title: Emraan Hashmi says Bollywood suffering from ‘wild perception’ game, takes dig at those who criticise it: ‘They say it’s full of drugs, parties…’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Hindi film industry faced highly coordinated and drummed by negativity on social media few years ago, where it was made to be the breeding ground of all things rotten.
articles.content: Who needs a good PR? Considering the events in the last few years, it is the Hindi film industry. Actor Emraan Hashmi says Bollywood has been a victim of “skewed negative perception” where those who … [+2204 chars]
